page.title: 14Sarah Barron
page.content:
One hour in the live of Sarah Barron
On Monday morning I felt awful, I was going to the Dentist. I got ready to go at 9.30 and I ate My Breakfast and cleaned my teeth for 16 minutes. I was really scrubbing my teeth. At 10.00 we started off more nervous than ever, we entered the waiting room, "Mr Backer, please". The horrifying noise of the drill made me feel worse."Sarah Barron, please". I walked out of the waiting room and sat in the chair."Hello", said the Dentist,"Hello", I said."B4 A6 D3 B2" What a jumble of numbers! "I'm afraid you'll have to have a filling.". So he gave me an injection and filled in my tooth and I went home and my tooth felt weird. When I got to school my friends were having an English lesson.
